entry.title: temp
entry.content: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include<iostream>#include<random>#include<time.h>using namespace std;void thrthr() { srand((unsigned)time(0)); int a[3][3], i, j, sum; for (i = 0; i <= 2; i++) { for (j = 0; j <= 2; j++) { a[i][j] = rand() % (99 - 10 + 1) + 10; cout << a[i][j] << " "; } cout << endl; } sum = a[0][0] + a[0][2] + a[1][1] + a[2][0] + a[2][2]; cout << "ÂØπËßíÁ∫øÂÖÉÁ¥†‰πãÂíå‰∏∫Ôºö" << sum << endl;}void swapp(int array[], int i, int j) { int temp = array[i]; array[i] = array[j]; array[j] = temp;}void maopao() { int arr[10], i, j; cout << "ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•Ë¶ÅÊéíÂ∫èÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†Ôºö" << endl; for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) { cin >> arr[i]; } for (i = 0; i < 9; i++) { for (j = i + 1; j < 10; j++) { if (arr[i] > arr[j]) swapp(arr, j, i); } } cout << "ÊéíÂ∫èÂêéÁöÑÊï∞ÁªÑÂÖÉÁ¥†" << endl; for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) { cout << arr[i] << " " << endl; }}int main() { thrthr(); maopao(); return 0;} 19-11-04123456789101112131415161718192021#include<iostream>using namespace std;void sum(int);int main() { sum(5); return 0;}int factorial(int num) { if (num == 1) return 1; else return num * factorial(num - 1);}void sum(int num) { int sum = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= num; i++) { factorial(i); sum += factorial(i); cout <<i<< "!="<<factorial(i) << endl; } cout<<"Èò∂‰πòÁöÑÂíå‰∏∫Ôºö"<<sum<<endl;} 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728#include<iostream>using namespace std;void godbah();bool prime(int);int main(){ godbah(); return 0;}void godbah() { int n; cout << "ËæìÂÖ•‰∏çÂ∞è‰∫é 6 ÁöÑÂÅ∂Êï∞Ôºö" << endl; cin >> n; for (int i = 3; i <= n; i++) { if (prime(i) && prime(n - i)) { cout << n << "=" << i << "+" << n - i << endl; break; } }}bool prime(int num) { int i; for (i = 2; i < num; i += 2) { if (num % i == 0) return false; } if (i == num) return true;}
